mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, sort, href, icon, is_show, sys_code, permission, remarks, platform_id, create_time, update_time
LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.sys_code, a.platform_id, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM u_menu a LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN u_role_menu r ON a.id=r.menu_id AND a.is_show='1' AND a.platform_id = #{platformId} AND r.role_id in (select e.id from u_user u,u_user_role r,u_role e where u.id=r.user_id and r.role_id=e.id and u.id=#{userId}) order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.icon, a.is_show, a.sys_code, a.permission, a.remarks, a.platform_id, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM u_menu a WHERE a.is_show='1' AND a.platform_id = #{platformId} AND a.sys_code = #{sysCode} order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT distinct a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.sys_code, a.platform_id, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM u_menu a WHERE id in ( SELECT menu_id from u_role_menu where role_id in ( SELECT id from u_role where id in ( SELECT role_id from u_user_role where user_id = #{userId}) and platform_id = #{platformId} )) order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, a.sys_code, a.remarks, a.platform_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.platform_id, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM u_menu a LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN u_role_menu r ON a.id=r.menu_id AND a.is_show='1' AND r.role_id= #{roleId} order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.icon, a.sys_code, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.platform_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.platform_id, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM u_menu a LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN u_role_menu r ON a.id=r.menu_id AND r.role_id in (select role_id from u_platform_role where platform_id = #{platformId} ) order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT distinct
FROM u_menu WHERE id IN(SELECT distinct parent_id FROM u_menu WHERE id IN(${menus})) order by parent_id,sort

SELECT distinct
FROM u_menu WHERE id IN(${menuIds}) order by parent_id,sort
